overview: Susumu Fujita is a CEO of CyberAgent, Inc. He was born in 1973. In 1997, he joined Intelligence. Ltd after graduating Aoyama University’ s Faculty of business administration. Then he fouded CyberAgent, Inc and came in CEO when he was 24 years old. The company made a singnificant headway on Internet advertising.
